author: Deutsche Welle
title: Israel-Hamas war: Biden still believes in two-state solution â€“ DNyuz
text:
01\/19\/2024January 19, 2024 Benjamin Netanyahu rejects US call for a Palestinian state
Israeli Prime Minister has once again expressed his opposition to a to the longstanding conflict between Israel and the Palestinian territories.
He said a Palestinian state would become a launching pad for future
Netanyahu said Israel â€œmust have security control over the entire territory west of the Jordan River.â€
He added: â€œThat collides with the idea of sovereignty. What can we do?â€
â€œThis truth I tell to our American friends, and I put the brakes on the attempt to coerce us to a reality that would endanger the state of Israel,â€ he said.
The remarks come after the US, Israelâ€™s closest ally, called for steps toward the establishment of a Palestinian state.
â€œIsraelâ€™s prime minister must be able to say â€˜noâ€™ when necessary, even to our best friends,â€ Netanyahu said.
Speaking Wednesday at the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, US Secretary of State Antony Blinken said the two-state solution was the best way to protect Israel.
Without a â€œpathway to a Palestinian state,â€ he said, Israel would not â€œget genuine security.â€
Israeli President Isaac Herzog, also speaking in Davos, said that â€œIsraelis lost trust in the peace processes because they could see that terror is glorified by our neighbors.â€
Netanyahu has also pushed back against US calls for a winding down of the conflict, saying on Thursday: â€œWe will not be satisfied with anything less than total victory.â€
â€œVictory will take many months,â€ he added.
The post Israel-Hamas war: Biden still believes in two-state solution appeared first on Deutsche Welle .

author: Kelly Martin
title: Life360 Achieves Milestone Performance in 2024 Financial Results
text:
Life360 Achieves Milestone Performance in 2024 Financial Results
Kelly MartinUpdated: 02-27-2025 04:58 PM
Overview of Life360â€™s Recent Performance
Life360, Inc. is redefining family safety and connectivity with its innovative technology. Recently, the company revealed remarkable results for the fourth quarter and full year, showcasing an impressive growth trajectory in various key metrics. Monthly active users (MAUs) soared to around 79.6 million, reflecting a 30% increase from the previous year, while the annual revenue reached a commendable $371 million.
Stellar Growth in User Engagement
In Q4 2024, Life360 added approximately 2.8 million new users. This growth underscored the company's robust organic acquisition strategy and the effectiveness of its brand-focused initiatives. The achieving of 457 thousand net additions to paying circles brought the total to nearly 2.3 million, highlighting a successful expansion of its core offering.
Subscription Revenue Insights
Life360's subscription revenue grew by 32% year-over-year, tallying $78.8 million in Q4 alone. This remarkable performance is indicative of the increasing customer willingness to invest in solutions that enhance family safety. The core subscription revenue - which focuses on the Life360 application - also demonstrated a significant increase, reinforcing the company's strategic focus on its digital platform.
Financial Highlights
Life360's financial achievements during Q4 included a net income of $8.5 million, marking a notable shift towards profitability. This was complemented by a positive Adjusted EBITDA of $21.2 million, indicating a robust operational framework capable of sustaining growth while managing costs effectively.
Operating Cash Flow
The companyâ€™s operating cash flow also saw a solid increase, reporting $12.3 million for the quarter. This increased cash flow, coupled with a strategic reduction in operational expenses, positions Life360 well for future investments and innovations.
Strategic Outlook for 2025
Looking ahead, Life360 aims to elevate its user base to 150 million, with projections set to surpass $1 billion in annual revenue. The launch of advanced features, including new products and services is anticipated to drive sustained growth. The company is well-positioned to capture the growing demand for family safety solutions on a global scale.
Investment in Innovation
The investment into developing new devices, including a focus on launching a cutting-edge pet device, signals Life360's commitment to innovation. This strategic move aims to bolster its product portfolio and enhance customer engagement across various market segments.
Conclusion
Life360 is embarking on an exciting journey with ambitious growth targets and a clear focus on leveraging technology to improve family safety and connectivity. With its latest financial performance, the company demonstrates a powerful model for sustainable growth, positioning itself as a leader in the family safety service sector.
Frequently Asked Questions
What were Life360's total revenue figures for 2024?
Life360 reported total revenue of $371 million for the fiscal year of 2024, marking a 22% increase year-over-year.
How many monthly active users did Life360 report?
As of December 31, 2024, Life360 reported approximately 79.6 million monthly active users.
What is the target revenue for Life360 in 2025?
Life360 aims to generate consolidated revenue between $450 million and $480 million in 2025.
Is Life360 profitable?
Yes, Life360 achieved a positive net income of $8.5 million in Q4 2024, alongside a positive Adjusted EBITDA.
What new products is Life360 planning to launch?
Life360 is focusing on launching new devices, including a device aimed specifically at pet tracking, in 2025.

topics: Economy, Business and Finance->business reporting and performance

author: Kennedy Felton
title: Airline reports fewer bookings to Japan ahead of popular July 5 prediction
text:
If you or someone you know has plans to travel to Japan this summer and youâ€™re even a little superstitious, thereâ€™s one date to look out for: July 5. A manga from the late 1990s eerily predicts past disasters, with that upcoming date now circled in red.
The author calls it her â€œdream journal,â€ and at least one airline has reported a significant drop in bookings around that time.
â€˜The Future I Sawâ€™ connects to past events
In 1999, manga artist Ryo Tatsuki published â€œWatashi ga Mita Miraiâ€ (â€œThe Future I Sawâ€), a book based on hundreds of her recorded dreams.
Her first notable dream came in 1991. She saw a man with a brilliant personality and striking features who would soon die. Months later, British rock icon Freddie Mercury passed away â€” though some consider it coincidence.
In 1995, Tatsuki recorded a dream about a violent earthquake rocking her hometown of Kobe, Japan.
On Jan. 17 that year, a 6.9 magnitude quake struck the area. According to National Geographic, it killed 6,000 people and left 45,000 homeless.
A shocking March 2011 prediction
One of her most chilling entries came in 1991, when she wrote, â€œa huge catastrophe will occur in March 2011.â€
That prediction aligned with the 9.1 magnitude earthquake known as the â€œGreat East Japan Earthquakeâ€ that struck on March 11, 2011. The resulting tsunami killed more than 16,000 people and left 2,500 missing.
Now, a new date from Tatsukiâ€™s dream journal is drawing attention.
Local Japanese media reports that she added â€œJuly 5, 2025â€ to the front cover of her book. Tatsuki has said sheâ€™s unsure if the date connects to a quake, but believed it was significant enough to highlight.
Airlines report reduced demand
In a dream, Tatsuki reportedly saw the sea boiling south of Japan. She interpreted it as an underwater volcanic eruption that could trigger destruction.
And while thereâ€™s no scientific basis for the claim, some travelers are taking note. According to one Japanese outlet, Greater Bay Airlines has seen a sharp drop in July 5 bookings.
â€œWe expected around 80 percent of the seats to be taken, but actual reservations came to only 40 percent,â€ said Hiroki Ito, general manager of Greater Bay Airlines.
Multiple outlets report the airline has reduced flights around that date due to low demand.
However, Japan Airlines and All Nippon Airways say they have not noticed any significant decrease in bookings.
Meanwhile, feng shui master Qi Xian Yu has also predicted a year of natural disasters, including aviation accidents, and cautioned against traveling to countries like Japan and South Korea in 2025.
â€œIt would be a major problem if the spread of non-scientific rumors on social media had an effect on tourism,â€ said Yoshihiro Murai, governor of Miyagi Prefecture.
In an April 23 news conference, Gov. Murai emphasized that Japanese citizens are not fleeing the country and urged tourists to keep visiting.
Experts say predictions are unreliable
The U.S. Geological Survey and other global scientific agencies maintain that no one can accurately predict major earthquakes.
â€œWe do not know how, and we do not expect to know how any time in the foreseeable future,â€ the agency stated.

author: Patrick Mayer
title: Deutsche Schulen: SchÃ¼ler-Vertreter offenbaren â€žgravierende MissstÃ¤nde"
text:
Deutsche Schulen: SchÃ¼ler-Vertreter offenbaren â€žgravierende MissstÃ¤ndeâ€œ
Eine Sprecherin der BundesschÃ¼lerkonferenz beschreibt bei Ippen.Media, woran es in Deutschlands Schulen fehlt - samt Forderungen an Kanzler Friedrich Merz.
Berlin - Am Dienstag (24. Juni) war es so weit. Die schwarz-rote Bundesregierung aus CDU/CSU und SPD hat ihren Entwurf fÃ¼r den Bundeshaushalt 2025 vorgelegt. Darin sind im Umfeld von Ukraine-Krieg und Russland-Aggression nicht zuletzt immense Verteidigungsausgaben zur AufrÃ¼stung der Bundeswehr enthalten.
Schulen in Deutschland: Thema Bildung ging im Bundestagswahlkampf unter
Bis zu 95 Milliarden Euro sollen in die deutschen StreitkrÃ¤fte flieÃŸen. Die Verteidigungspolitik war schlieÃŸlich auch ein zentrales Thema im Wahlkampf zur Bundestagswahl 2025. Ganz im Gegensatz zur Bildung allgemein und zu Schulen im Speziellen. Dabei wird seit Jahren Ã¼ber eklatante VersÃ¤umnisse in der Ausstattung deutscher Bildungseinrichtungen berichtet.
Zum Beispiel bei ausreichend und zeitgemÃ¤ÃŸen digitalen GerÃ¤ten. Im Umfeld von Bundeshaushalt und schwarz-roten PlÃ¤nen fÃ¼r Deutschland hat die Sprecherin der BundesschÃ¼lerkonferenz auf Anfrage der Frankfurter Rundschau von Ippen.Media jetzt â€žgravierende MissstÃ¤ndeâ€œ benannt. Sie stellt eindringliche Forderungen an die Koalition von Bundeskanzler Friedrich Merz (CDU) und Bundesfinanzminister Lars Klingbeil (SPD).
Bildung in Deutschland: Expertin berichtet von MissstÃ¤nden an deutschen Schulen
â€žDie MissstÃ¤nde an deutschen Schulen sind vielerorts gravierend und sie ziehen sich durch nahezu alle Bereiche: Vom akuten LehrkrÃ¤ftemangel, Ã¼ber unzureichende digitale Infrastruktur bis hin zu baulichen MÃ¤ngeln, die zum Teil gesundheitsgefÃ¤hrdend sind. Es ist keine Ausnahme, sondern bittere RealitÃ¤t, dass SchÃ¼lerinnen und SchÃ¼ler in RÃ¤umen mit Schimmelbefall, undichten Fenstern und defekten BÃ¶den unterrichtet werdenâ€œ, erklÃ¤rt Tilda Skerra â€“ â€žWenn Ã¼berhaupt LehrkrÃ¤fte zur VerfÃ¼gung stehenâ€œ. Digitale EndgerÃ¤te wÃ¼rden ebenso fehlen wie stabiles WLAN oder zeitgemÃ¤ÃŸe Lernumgebungen, schildert sie.
Skerra ist Mitglied im Bundessekretariat der BundesschÃ¼lerkonferenz (BSK), die sich als Vertretung von SchÃ¼lerinnen und SchÃ¼lern der Bildungspolitik in Deutschland annimmt. Und zwar bei Themen von Ã¼berregionaler Bedeutung. So sollen Anliegen von SchÃ¼lern und SchÃ¼lerinnen bundesweit GehÃ¶r verschafft werden, wÃ¤hrend fÃ¼r das Thema Bildung im deutschen FÃ¶deralismus vorrangig die BundeslÃ¤nder zustÃ¤ndig sind.
Es ist keine Ausnahme, sondern bittere RealitÃ¤t, dass SchÃ¼ler*innen in RÃ¤umen mit Schimmelbefall, undichten Fenstern und defekten BÃ¶den unterrichtet werden.
Die Kulturhoheit der LÃ¤nder im Bildungsbereich ist im Grundgesetz verankert. Der Bund nimmt durch FÃ¶rdermittel und Subventionen, etwa bei Bauvorhaben, aber sehr wohl erheblichen Einfluss auf die Bildungspolitik und kann die LÃ¤nder je nach Gewichtung des Themas bei der Budgetierung erheblich entlasten - oder eben nicht.
SondervermÃ¶gen der schwarz-roten Koalition: SchÃ¼ler-Vertreter fordern viel mehr Geld von Merz
Nach Ansicht von Skerra und ihrer Mitstreiter kommen aus Berlin zu wenige Signale und vor allem zu wenig Geld, um frÃ¼here VersÃ¤umnisse anzugehen und bestenfalls zu beheben. â€žWir fordern, dass mindestens zehn Prozent des geplanten Infrastruktur-SondervermÃ¶gens, also rund 50 Milliarden Euro, zweckgebunden in die Sanierung und Modernisierung von Schulen investiert werdenâ€œ, erklÃ¤rt Skerra unserer Redaktion. â€žDarÃ¼ber hinaus braucht es ein langfristig angelegtes FÃ¶rderprogramm, das die bauliche, digitale und strukturelle Weiterentwicklung unserer Schulen strategisch begleitet.â€œ
Ferner mÃ¼sse der schon unter der frÃ¼heren Ampel-Bundesregierung so bezeichnete â€žDigitalPakt deutlich aufgestockt und ausgebaut werden, um Bildung endlich nachhaltig im 21. Jahrhundert anzukommen zu lassenâ€œ, meint die Expertin. Zu weiteren Forderungen der BundesschÃ¼lerkonferenz gehÃ¶rt die Sicherstellung der Finanzierung von verpflichtenden Fort- und Weiterbildungsbereichen, was etwa die Themen â€žmentale Gesundheitâ€œ und â€ždigitale Lehrformateâ€œ betreffe. Und ein realistischer BetreuungsschlÃ¼ssel, wie es die BSK-Sprecherin beschreibt: â€žMindestens eine Schulsozialarbeiterin oder ein Schulsozialarbeiter auf 300 SchÃ¼ler*innen und auf 150 SchÃ¼ler*innen eine Schulpsychologin oder ein Schulpsychologe je Bundesland.â€œ
Lars Klingbeil stellt Bundeshaushalt 2025 vor: Bildungsausgaben steigen leicht
Das alles gebe es bislang nicht. Die Investitionen in die Bildung, die Vize-Kanzler Klingbeil im Bundeshaushalt 2025 vorstellte, dÃ¼rften bei den Experten aus dem Bereich jedoch fÃ¼r Ã¼berschaubare Begeisterung sorgen. Laut Website des Bundesfinanzministeriums entfallen von 488,60 Milliarden Euro aus dem Regierungsentwurf gerade mal 4,57 Prozent auf die Themen Bildung und Forschung - rund 22,31 Milliarden Euro.
Das ist ein leichter Anstieg. Zum Vergleich: Die gescheiterte Ampel-Bundesregierung hatte fÃ¼r 2024 noch 21,49 Milliarden Euro eingeplant. Laut Bundesfinanzministerium sollen aus dem SondervermÃ¶gen zudem insgesamt 6,5 Milliarden Euro in Investitionen fÃ¼r die Kindertagesbetreuung und in die digitale Bildung flieÃŸen. In einem Zeitraum bis 2029. Von den geforderten 50 Milliarden Euro der BSK ist das weit entfernt. (pm)

author: NULL
title: UN attacks Africa for attitudes towards abortion
text: Iulia Elena Cazan (ZENIT News â€“ [Center for Family and Human Rights](https://c-fam.org/) / Nueva York, 12.28.2023).- International abortion groups and UN agencies are influencing the development of massive propaganda programs in Africa. With government officials, they are carrying out large-scale advocacy campaigns to include abortion as an essential health service. The United Nations Population Fund (UNFPA) and the World Health Organization (WHO) released a [report](https://reliefweb.int/report/world/unlocking-future-advancing-universal-sexual-and-reproductive-health-and-rights-within-universal-health-coverage-east-and-southern-africa) committed to coupling health services and abortion in Southeast Africa and that no country in that region, such as Angola, Botswana, Kenya, Malawi, Uganda and Malawi among others, will be able to attain universal health care without universal sexual and reproductive care. The report admits that access to contraception, pregnancy care, and HIV treatments are already partially included in many universal health care packages in that region. Still, UN agencies push for the inclusion of abortion access and comprehensive sexuality education as â€œessentialâ€ components of health care. To ensure widespread abortion access in the region, the report recommends â€œstrengthening the digital health ecosystem and related self-care interventions.â€ Earlier this year, the WHO [launched a mobile app](https://unric.org/en/who-comprehensive-abortion-care-tool-mobile-app/) to help healthcare providers offer better abortion â€œcareâ€ to pregnant women. The app â€œtakes the individual characteristics of patients and generates patient-specific assessments or recommendationsâ€ and helps facilitate remote patient support to â€œassistâ€ women while performing abortions at home. The WHO-UNFPA report also shared that a crucial factor in ensuring â€œcomprehensive sexual reproductive health careâ€ is conducting â€œvalue clarificationâ€ work for providers. This kind of work attempts to â€œdestigmatizeâ€ abortion among medical personnel and encourage them to perform abortions. It is clear that many medical personnel in Africa oppose abortion. Ipas, an international organization whose expressed purpose is to promote abortion all over the world, has a full curriculum on this, the Ipas Values Clarification for Action and Transformation (VCAT), and uses it to knock down medical and religious beliefs about abortion across Africa. In a recent [press release](https://www.ipas.org/news/in-the-democratic-republic-of-congo-policymakers-commit-to-including-abortion-in-universal-health-coverage/), Ipas claimed victory in the Democratic Republic of Congo. Comprehensive abortion care is now included in the universal health program and boasted that it was one of the key factors in making this happen. Such policy change did not come about solely by mobilizing civil society organizations. Ipas offered SRH training to government officials, including the DRC Health Ministry personnel. Ipas said it was able to find supporters inside the government. It is clear that money played a huge role in the shift. The Ipas director in the Congo said as much, â€œthe existing government budget is unable to finance integrating abortion careâ€¦Ipas is working to secure this missing funding.â€ It is likely the missing funding came from the Biden administration. While celebrating Universal Health Coverage Day, Ipas said that â€œa powerful joint statement signed by 60 countries emerged from the United Nations General Assembly in September that calls for sexual and reproductive health and rights to be an essential component of UHC.â€ This was not a document of the UN General Assembly, however. An international right to abortion has never emerged from the General Assembly and a significant number of UN members consistently delivered statements at the UN clarifying that they do not consider the term â€œsexual and reproductive health and rightsâ€ as to include abortion.

author: Dominic McGrath; PA
title: Tories â€˜writing offâ€™ young people as growing number â€˜economically inactiveâ€™ â€“ The Irish News
text: The Tories are â€œwriting offâ€ young people, Labour has said, with the number of young people out of work due to â€œlong-term sicknessâ€ doubling since 2010. Sir Keir Starmerâ€™s party said that in 2010/11, there were 116,000 16 to 24-year-olds out of work or not looking for employment due to long-term sickness. The latest Office for National Statistics (ONS) data for the whole of the UK now puts this number at 235,000 people out of work, the party said. Shadow work and pensions secretary Liz Kendall said: â€œBy neglecting the foundations needed for a healthy economy, the Tories are writing off hundreds of thousands of young people.â€ The Labour MP said her party would ensure young people do not fall between the cracks between services and Government departments. It hopes that improving mental health services, as well as reducing NHS waiting lists and strengthening workersâ€™ rights, will help tackle the â€œroot causesâ€ of economic inactivity. Ms Kendall said: â€œLabour will tackle the root causes of economic inactivity, including the mental health crisis facing so many of our young people. â€œWe will transform mental health services, drive down NHS waiting lists, boost skills, bolster employment rights and provide tailored job support.â€ Chancellor Jeremy Hunt and Work and Pensions Secretary Mel Stride have both sought to get people of all ages back into the workplace, in a bid to boost labour supply across the UK. The proportion of people out of work rose since the start of the Covid-19 pandemic in 2020, but the issue is also seen to be caused by a broader set of factors including rising disability and long-term sickness levels. A Government spokesperson said: â€œWe are driving down inactivity and helping young people into work as we build on our track record of youth unemployment falling by 43% since 2010. â€œWe are investing Â£2.3 billion into mental health services and supporting more 16 and 17-year-olds to participate in education and apprenticeships. â€œMore widely our Back to Work Plan will help up to 1.1 million people with long-term health conditions, disabilities or long-term unemployed to look for and stay in work.â€ A Conservative spokesman accused Labour of having a â€œbrass neckâ€, saying the party had â€œnever left office with unemployment lower than what they inheritedâ€.

author: Sara Castellanos
title: La playa de este rincÃ³n del sur de EspaÃ±a con la estampa mÃ¡s curiosa: donde se baÃ±an mÃ¡s de 100 vacas cada maÃ±ana
text:
La playa de este rincÃ³n del sur de EspaÃ±a con la estampa mÃ¡s curiosa: donde se baÃ±an mÃ¡s de 100 vacas cada maÃ±ana
Un centenar de vacas retintas recorren cada dÃ­a la orilla de una playa virgen del sur andaluz. Un fenÃ³meno que ha convertido este paraje natural en una postal Ãºnica del verano
Estamos mÃ¡s habituados a ver vacas pastando en los verdes prados del norte de EspaÃ±a, como en Asturias o Cantabria, que paseando por la orilla del mar. Sin embargo, existe un rincÃ³n en el sur de AndalucÃ­a donde cada maÃ±ana se repite una estampa tan inesperada como fascinante: mÃ¡s de un centenar de vacas retintas se adueÃ±an de la playa en un entorno completamente virgen. Este fenÃ³meno, captado en mÃºltiples ocasiones por visitantes sorprendidos, ha convertido la escena en una de las mÃ¡s curiosas del litoral gaditano, generando gran interÃ©s en redes sociales y foros de viajeros.
[@todorutas]ðŸ“Â¿CONOCES ESTE CURIOSO LUGAR? ðŸ„ðŸ–ï¸ âœ…Escribe un comentario âœï¸ y te cuento cÃ³mo llegar y poder dormir con autocaravana , camper, nosotros lo hicimos con @autocaravanas_la_kombiperfecta ðŸš ðŸ“ŒEn CÃ¡diz, entre la playa de Pajares y la Playa de Zahara, nos encontramos esta curiosa estampa con vacas a pie de playa, mÃ¡s de 100 vacas pastando en estas praderas. ðŸ„â›°ï¸ðŸŒ± ðŸ“¸En pocos sitios se puede ver un escenario como este, una enorme costa paradisÃ­aca formada por varias playas, con mÃ¡s de 10 km de largo, praderas, montaÃ±as y mucho verde. ðŸŒ¿ðŸŒº â„¹ï¸Entre Barbate y Zahara de los Atunes es donde se suelen encontrar. ðŸ“ðŸ„ ðŸ”GuÃ¡rdate este lugar Ãºnico y sÃ­guenos para mÃ¡s lugares naturales y consejos. ðŸŒŠðŸš[#zaharadelosatunes][#playadezahara][#barbate][#cÃ¡diz][#playadelasvacas][#vacaretina][#lugarescuriosos][#lugaresunicos][#andalucia][#autocaravana][#alquilerdeautocaravanas][â™¬ Pedro - Jaxomy & Agatino Romero & Raffaella CarrÃ ]
Este singular espectÃ¡culo tiene lugar entre Barbate y Zahara de los Atunes, en la playa de Pajares, situada en una zona militar conocida como el campo de adiestramiento â€˜Sierra del RetÃ­nâ€™. Por estas extensas praderas, conectadas con las dunas, transitan cada dÃ­a las vacas retintas que acuden a refrescarse y descansar junto al mar, sin alteraciones humanas a su alrededor.
El paraÃ­so donde las vacas disfrutan del mar
La imagen de estas reses tomando el sol o paseando por la arena no solo ha captado la atenciÃ³n de los turistas, sino tambiÃ©n del Patronato Provincial de Turismo de CÃ¡diz, que ha destacado en varias ocasiones este lugar como una muestra de la convivencia entre naturaleza y tradiciÃ³n ganadera. No es esta la Ãºnica playa de la zona, otras playas vÃ­rgenes de la provincia, como Bolonia o El RetÃ­n, tambiÃ©n acogen a estos singulares visitantes. En el caso de Bolonia, su belleza natural y la presencia de ganado han generado incluso imÃ¡genes virales, como la de la famosa vaca Paquita durante la pandemia.
Con mÃ¡s de 10 kilÃ³metros de litoral sin edificaciones, este tramo de costa ofrece un escenario que combina playas salvajes, montaÃ±as cubiertas de vegetaciÃ³n y amplios pastizales. Ver a estos animales, que no necesitan sombrilla ni toalla, moverse con tranquilidad por la arena y en ocasiones hasta compartir sombra con los turistas, ha convertido a este lugar en un atractivo turÃ­stico inesperado. Para quienes viajan en autocaravana o camper, es ademÃ¡s como un destino ideal para pernoctar rodeado de naturaleza. Un enclave sorprendente en pleno sur de EspaÃ±a donde el mar, el ganado y el paisaje se funden en una postal Ãºnica.
Estamos mÃ¡s habituados a ver vacas pastando en los verdes prados del norte de EspaÃ±a, como en Asturias o Cantabria, que paseando por la orilla del mar. Sin embargo, existe un rincÃ³n en el sur de AndalucÃ­a donde cada maÃ±ana se repite una estampa tan inesperada como fascinante: mÃ¡s de un centenar de vacas retintas se adueÃ±an de la playa en un entorno completamente virgen. Este fenÃ³meno, captado en mÃºltiples ocasiones por visitantes sorprendidos, ha convertido la escena en una de las mÃ¡s curiosas del litoral gaditano, generando gran interÃ©s en redes sociales y foros de viajeros.
CÃ¡diz
